name: SnapShotTest

values.name: describe
values.comment: Group and describe a list of test

values.name: it
values.comment: Define a test with a message

values.name: snapshotUpdate
values.comment: Creates a record given an initial Model, an update function and a list of tests. This record is used to build snapshots with Jest
values.type: model -> (msg -> model -> ( model, cmd )) -> List ( String, msg ) -> List (SnapShotTest.Test msg model)
